languages.text: "Понадобилось время, чтобы я признал — есть редкие люди, которым правильно быть выше всех законов. Такие как ты". {n}Арбитр делает задумчивую паузу.{/n} "Встреться мы раньше, думаю, я бы посвятил жизнь служению тебе, а не Лекс Империалис".

"It took a while for me to realise that some people — the rare few — are rightly above all laws. People like you." {n}He pauses thoughtfully.{/n} "Had we met sooner, I think I would have dedicated my life to serving you, and not the Lex Imperialis."
languages.original_text: "Понадобилось время, чтобы я признал — есть редкие люди, которым правильно быть выше всех законов. Такие как ты". {n}Арбитр делает задумчивую паузу.{/n} "Встреться мы раньше, думаю, я бы посвятил жизнь служению тебе, а не Лекс Империалис".

traits.locale_text: "It took a while for me to realise that some people — the rare few — are rightly above all laws. People like you." {n}He pauses thoughtfully.{/n} "Had we met sooner, I think I would have dedicated my life to serving you, and not the Lex Imperialis."

"It took a while for me to realise that some people — the rare few — are rightly above all laws. People like you." {n}He pauses thoughtfully.{/n} "Had we met sooner, I think I would have dedicated my life to serving you, and not the Lex Imperialis."

"It took a while for me to realise that some people — the rare few — are rightly above all laws. People like you." {n}He pauses thoughtfully.{/n} "Had we met sooner, I think I would have dedicated my life to serving you, and not the Lex Imperialis."

"It took a while for me to realise that some people — the rare few — are rightly above all laws. People like you." {n}He pauses thoughtfully.{/n} "Had we met sooner, I think I would have dedicated my life to serving you, and not the Lex Imperialis."

"It took a while for me to realise that some people — the rare few — are rightly above all laws. People like you." {n}He pauses thoughtfully.{/n} "Had we met sooner, I think I would have dedicated my life to serving you, and not the Lex Imperialis."

languages.text: 「気づくまでに時間がかかりました。ごくまれに、すべての法を超越してしかるべき人が…あなたのような人がいるということに」{n}彼は思案するように言葉を切った。{/n}「もっと早くあなたに出会っていたら、私はきっと、レックス・インペリアではなく、あなたに仕えることに人生を捧げていたでしょう」
languages.original_text: "It took a while for me to realise that some people — the rare few — are rightly above all laws. People like you." {n}He pauses thoughtfully.{/n} "Had we met sooner, I think I would have dedicated my life to serving you, and not the Lex Imperialis."

traits.locale_text: 「気づくまでに時間がかかりました。ごくまれに、すべての法を超越してしかるべき人が…あなたのような人がいるということに」{n}彼は思案するように言葉を切った。{/n}「もっと早くあなたに出会っていたら、私はきっと、レックス・インペリアではなく、あなたに仕えることに人生を捧げていたでしょう」

languages.text: "Ich habe eine Weile gebraucht, um zu erkennen, dass manche Leute – sehr wenige – mit Recht über allen Gesetzen stehen. Wie Ihr zum Beispiel." {n}Er macht eine nachdenkliche Pause.{/n} "Hätten wir uns früher kennengelernt, hätte ich wohl mein Leben in Eure Dienste gestellt und nicht in die des Lex Imperia."
languages.original_text: "It took a while for me to realise that some people — the rare few — are rightly above all laws. People like you." {n}He pauses thoughtfully.{/n} "Had we met sooner, I think I would have dedicated my life to serving you, and not the Lex Imperialis."

traits.locale_text: "Ich habe eine Weile gebraucht, um zu erkennen, dass manche Leute – sehr wenige – mit Recht über allen Gesetzen stehen. Wie Ihr zum Beispiel." {n}Er macht eine nachdenkliche Pause.{/n} "Hätten wir uns früher kennengelernt, hätte ich wohl mein Leben in Eure Dienste gestellt und nicht in die des Lex Imperia."

languages.text: « Il m'a fallu du temps pour comprendre que certaines personnes, fort rares au demeurant, se placent à juste titre au-dessus des lois. Des personnes comme vous. » {n}Il s'interrompt, l'air songeur.{/n} « Si nous nous étions connus plus tôt, je crois que j'aurais consacré ma vie à vous servir, vous, et non pas la Lex Imperialis. »
languages.original_text: "It took a while for me to realise that some people — the rare few — are rightly above all laws. People like you." {n}He pauses thoughtfully.{/n} "Had we met sooner, I think I would have dedicated my life to serving you, and not the Lex Imperialis."

traits.locale_text: « Il m'a fallu du temps pour comprendre que certaines personnes, fort rares au demeurant, se placent à juste titre au-dessus des lois. Des personnes comme vous. » {n}Il s'interrompt, l'air songeur.{/n} « Si nous nous étions connus plus tôt, je crois que j'aurais consacré ma vie à vous servir, vous, et non pas la Lex Imperialis. »

languages.text: «Tardé un tiempo en comprender que algunas personas son excepcionales y merecen estar por encima de la ley. Personas como usted». {n}Hace una pausa con aire pensativo.{/n} «De habernos conocido antes, creo que habría consagrado mi vida a su servicio en vez de a la Lex Imperialis».
languages.original_text: "It took a while for me to realise that some people — the rare few — are rightly above all laws. People like you." {n}He pauses thoughtfully.{/n} "Had we met sooner, I think I would have dedicated my life to serving you, and not the Lex Imperialis."

traits.locale_text: «Tardé un tiempo en comprender que algunas personas son excepcionales y merecen estar por encima de la ley. Personas como usted». {n}Hace una pausa con aire pensativo.{/n} «De habernos conocido antes, creo que habría consagrado mi vida a su servicio en vez de a la Lex Imperialis».

languages.text: “我花了很长时间才意识到，有的人，或者说极少数人，确实有权凌驾于法律之上，而你就是这样的人。”{n}他若有所悟地顿了顿。{/n}“如果我能早些遇见你，我恐怕不再会侍奉帝国律法，而会将我的一生奉献给你。”
languages.original_text: "It took a while for me to realise that some people — the rare few — are rightly above all laws. People like you." {n}He pauses thoughtfully.{/n} "Had we met sooner, I think I would have dedicated my life to serving you, and not the Lex Imperialis."

traits.locale_text: “我花了很长时间才意识到，有的人，或者说极少数人，确实有权凌驾于法律之上，而你就是这样的人。”{n}他若有所悟地顿了顿。{/n}“如果我能早些遇见你，我恐怕不再会侍奉帝国律法，而会将我的一生奉献给你。”

languages.text: "Geç fark ettim ki nadiren de olsa bazı insanlar hakikaten bütün kanunların üstündedir. Senin gibiler." {n}Düşünceli bir şekilde duraksıyor.{/n} "Önceden tanışıyor olsak ömrümü Lex İmperialis'e değil, hizmetine adardım."
languages.original_text: "It took a while for me to realise that some people — the rare few — are rightly above all laws. People like you." {n}He pauses thoughtfully.{/n} "Had we met sooner, I think I would have dedicated my life to serving you, and not the Lex Imperialis."

traits.locale_text: "Geç fark ettim ki nadiren de olsa bazı insanlar hakikaten bütün kanunların üstündedir. Sizin gibiler." {n}Düşünceli bir şekilde duraksadı.{/n} "Sizi evvela tanısaydım, ömrümü Lex İmperialis'e değil, size hizmete tahsis ederdim."

languages.original_text: "It took a while for me to realise that some people — the rare few — are rightly above all laws. People like you." {n}He pauses thoughtfully.{/n} "Had we met sooner, I think I would have dedicated my life to serving you, and not the Lex Imperialis."
